name: Death Detective
description:
Arimel Rosterfon, Private eye.

After being killed, the Arimel wakes up as a ghost, unable to move on to the afterlife until they solve their own murder. Now with the power of possession, Arimel can access other people's memories of the past. From there, they hop from memory to memory gaining more clues on their murderer until they are able to solve the case of their own homicide. The game is currently unfinished and will be finishing up development over the next couple weeks. It is released now for playtesting purposes only.

Controls:

W/A/S/D-move

Shift-run

Space-Jump

Tab-Open Journal

Left Click/E-Interact

DEBUG Commands

p- delete save

1- Discover Diner Scene

2- Discover Asylum Scene

3- Discover City Scene

4- Discover Office Scene

5- Discover Garage Scene

6- Discover Home Scene

7- Discover Doctor Scene
